meanings.sent1: The nobbiest outfit at the party was a sleek black dress.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses the nobbiest accessories to complete her look.
meanings.sent3: The cat strutted around the room, feeling like the nobbiest feline in town.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in the nobbiest shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: His nobbiest hat was the talk of the town for weeks.

meanings.definition: Having a pleasing appearance or design
meanings.sent1: The nobbiest flowers in the garden were the vibrant red roses.
meanings.sent2: The newly renovated cafe had the nobbiest interior decor in town.
meanings.sent3: The little girl proudly showed off her nobbiest drawing to her parents.
meanings.sent4: The cake was decorated with the nobbiest icing swirls imaginable.
meanings.sent5: The nobbiest puppy in the litter had a fluffy white coat.

meanings.definition: Being of high quality or superior in some way
meanings.sent1: The nobbiest furniture in the showroom was made of solid oak.
meanings.sent2: The chef prepared the nobbiest dish on the menu with great care.
meanings.sent3: The team celebrated their victory with the nobbiest champagne available.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was filled with the nobbiest words of wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The nobbiest smartphone on the market had all the latest features.
